Neuropathic pain syndromes * Peripheral (poly) neuropathy * Nerve entrapment * Radiculopathy * Post-herpetic neuralgia * De-afferentation pain post-cerebrovascular accident * Plexopathy * Motor neuron disease Vascular diseases * Thrombosis * Acrocyanosis * Atherosclerosis * Raynaud’s phenomenon * Erythromelalgia Inflammation * Erysipelas ¢ Inflammation-not otherwise specified * Bursitis * Seronegative arthritis * Rheumatologic diseases Myofascial pain syndromes * Overuse * Disuse ¢ Tennis elbow * Repetitive strain injury * Fibromyalgia Psychiatric problems * Somatoform pain disorders * Munchhausen syndrome
